title.@value: Intracerebral nontraumatic haemorrhage of fetus or newborn

definition.@value: A condition characterised by bleeding within the brain tissue of a fetus or newborn that is not due to injury causing physical damage.

label.@value: Intracerebral nontraumatic haemorrhage of fetus or newborn
brain haemorrhage in fetus or newborn
cerebral haemorrhage in fetus or newborn
intracerebral haemorrhage in fetus or newborn
Oedema of brain in fetus or newborn
